title: Romania's Got Talent
resume: Românii au talent is a TV show which first aired on 18 February 2011. The project is a franchise of Got Talent, developed by Simco Limited. The hosts of the show are Smiley and Pavel Bartoş. The judges are the Romanian singer Andra, a Pro TV star and presenter Andi Moisescu,TV presenter Mihaela Rădulescu and Florin Calinescu,Romanian actor, theatre director and television host.The grand prize is 120.000€.
